verses.roman:
haridāsera siddhi-prāpti,--adbhuta se saba
āpani mahāprabhu yāṅra kaila mahotsava

synonyms: haridāsera—of Ṭhākura Haridāsa; siddhi-prāpti—passing away; adbhuta—wonderful; se—those; saba—all incidents; āpani—personally; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yāṅra—whose; kaila—performed; mahā-utsava—festival.
translation: At Jagannātha Purī, Haridāsa Ṭhākura passed away. The incident was very wonderful because the Lord Himself performed the festival of Ṭhākura Haridāsa's departure.
